One of the most trendy plants of 2020, the
Monstera Deliciosa
is one of the most precious houseplants of the decade. It has become a recommended choice for its balance between beautiful look and easy maintenance.

The best plant there is.

The Philodendron Birkin is a rare houseplant with dark green leaves. It develops pure white pinstripes on its foliage, growing ever more variegated as the plant matures. Birkins stand out from the other houseplants, and bring creativity to your home.

The Philodendron Birkin is a rare houseplant with dark green leaves. It develops pure white pinstripes on its foliage, growing ever more variegated as the plant matures. Birkins stand out from the other houseplants, and bring creativity to your home.
The
Dendrobium

genus is one of the largest of all orchid groups with nearly 2,000 species. Native to southeast Asia, these plants grow in all manner of climates—from hot, wet lowlands to high-altitude, cool mountains

A curated list of blog posts to keep your updated on the latest furniture trends.
Japandi blends the smooth, modern lines of Scandinavian design with the sleek, functional, elegance of the Japanese aesthetic.

The infusion or a blend of Japanese and Scandinavian styles named as ‘Japandi’ and I will explain achieving 21 ways to Japandi Style. It sometimes also named as ‘Japanordic’ or ‘Scandenese.’  Almost all articles point out that ‘Japandi’ style carries the characteristics of both design trends.

children.textContent: Green plants obtain most of their energy from sunlight via photosynthesis by primary chloroplasts that are derived from endosymbiosis with cyanobacteria.
